column5: Uhmmmm... imagine drilling this by hand?? offset handles or not!!!  insane!    <embed width="430" height="389" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://s129.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid129.photobucket.com/albums/p224/gerritt_2006/thelonrivermay12.flv"></embed>   Gerritt.
lol, how did they start drilling???
WOW..  ..i dont think that you would have a problem taking your 4x4 out on that lake/river....  .
Apparently they start by standing on the roof of the truck and work there way down..... NO THANKS!!!!!!
That what I'm talking about, maybe a couple of step ladders would do the trick.
I think they drill, add an extension, drill some more, add an extension... similar to drilling for oil... but man.. even for a gas auger I assume it would take a bit of time.  Gerritt.
i'm gonna say they likely dont fish 2 lines a piece
I wanna know how many fish you'd lose trying to get their heads into the hole.  Funny video though, thanks for posting.
Wow . now that takes all the fun out of run and gun
....Brutal, so how long a gaff would one require?
I tell ya,  I won't have Nun-av-it!
